name: Additional Engineering
title: AENG
definition: Indicates that if additional engineering is required, an estimate of the charges is to be forwarded to the initiator of the request.

validEntry.description: engineering connections when more than one provider
overtime engineering and engineering with other

usageNotes: Optional when the ACT field is “N”, “C”, “M” or “T”, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: This engineering activity is ordered from applicable state tariffs, not from Inter-state Access Tariffs.
Additional technical information after the provider has provided the Design Layout Report (DLR), may be billable as additional engineering.
